name: lol-tournament-code
description: A League of Legends tournament code generator
author: Robert Manolea <manolea.robert@gmail.com>

scripts.browserify: browserify index -i expandjs > dist/lol-tournament-code.js && npm run browserify-min
scripts.browserify-min: browserify -d index -i expandjs -p [minifyify --map lol-tournament-code.min.map --output dist/lol-tournament-code.min.map] > dist/lol-tournament-code.min.js
